name: Yotzeret Sheydim Chronomancy Experiment א EP
name_original: Yotzeret Sheydim Chronomancy Experiment א EP
description:
Chronomancy Experiment א EP is an interactive art piece made with Yotzeret Sheydim's textured noise and sound work. It's an arcane ritual that runs in real time, doomed to repeat itself for eternity. You can log in at any time but it's closer to midnight when the spirits become restless...

Listen to the stems and pre-order the PC-CDROM here:
https://yotzeretsheydim.bandcamp.com/album/chronomancy-experiment-ep

This game was made in 7days as part of 7dfps game jam.
